Class UserDataSQLImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.spring.marker.rest.dao.UserDataSQLImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserData
    @Repository
public class UserDataSQLImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserData
    Implementation of the UserData interface providing to work with the PgSQL For PostgreSQL: in bean id="userData" set class="ru.spring.marker.rest.dao.UserDataSQLImpl"
